fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: Skeleton has been engaged in such activities through industry associations (e.g. The Defence Industry Association), feedback sessions with implementing Agencies (ETAG in Estonia) and private consultancies engaged in programme evaluation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Skeleton Technologies is active in Research and Development activities related to materials, production technologies and systems design research in ultracapacitor based energy storage systems.  
 
Skeleton has been asked and is willing to provide input for the appraisal, strategic positioning and financing of EU and national RTD activities.
